question: What are the current IT spending trends among companies in the technology industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies categorized under the technology industry and gather their ITBudget information.
Analyze the data to identify the average IT spending across these companies for the latest fiscal year.
Gather historical IT spending data from the past few years to compare current trends against historical data.
Identify any correlations between IT spending and company performance metrics such as Revenue and Net Income.
Explore any relevant IT trends linked to the technology industry using the IndustryITTrend table for further context on spending habits.
